entries.description: Restored correct labels on the "nodeport-proxy-envoy" deployment. If upgrading from the affected version, please delete the existing deployment for each cluster with the "LoadBalancer" expose strategy.

Secret name for S3 credentials updated to "kubermatic-s3-credentials". In case the "s3-credentials" secret was manually created instead of using the "minio" chart, new secret "kubermatic-s3-credentials" must be created.
Added option to get kubeconfig for external clusters
Added support for the Nutanix provider
Added the possibility for administrators to define default Rule Groups in the Admin Settings
Added support for application credentials to the Openstack preset creation wizard
Fixed AWS cloud provider cleanup sometimes getting stuck when cleaning up tags
Fixed Konnectivity authentication issue in some scenarios
Fixed applying resource requirements when using incomplete overrides
